summary: Replaces Mace of Molag Bal model to Draugh War Axe
descriptionHtml:
I found in game very good weapon for me, Mace of Molag Bal but I really didn't like it's design so I changed it to Draugh War Axe.

Didn't touch rusted version in the game world so don't be surprised, I touched only artifact u will get by finishing quest.

I didn't change statistics, only model, texture, sound and animation to axe version.


I did this mod for me, but uploaded here maybe some1 will like to use.


PS PICTURE U SEE HERE IS CLEAR DRAUGH AXE, IN GAME IT WILL HAVE GREEN ENCHANT EFFECT!

[Info update!] I noticed when I turned off "unofficial skyrim path" my mod wasn't working
author: radzio2k
